features.name: Webhook Processing
features.description: Processes incoming ClickUp webhook events and triggers relevant workflows.

features.name: Workflow Orchestration
features.description: Manages the full lifecycle of a task from import to completion, including agent triggering and approval.

features.name: Demo Creation
features.description: Automates the creation of demo websites by cloning templates and applying branding.

features.name: Cursor Agent Integration
features.description: Interfaces with Cursor IDE's agent to perform automated code changes.

features.name: Approval Workflow
features.description: Handles human-in-the-loop approvals via email or Slack tokens.

features.name: Reporting & Monitoring
features.description: Provides uptime monitoring and generates performance/status reports.

features.name: Task Import
features.description: Imports tasks and assets from ClickUp into the local workflow system.
